keywords.indexterm: Refreshing the navigatorApply pending updatesNavigator update pending

step.cmd: Click Apply pending updates in the Navigator toolbar.
Click Navigator update pending in the Navigator status bar.

taskbody.result: The agent status is updated in the Navigator. (You might not see any change if the branch containing the agent is collapsed.) The tool is disabled until the another status change is detected, at which time the counter starts again. If the workspace has automatic refresh turned on, the Navigator is updated at the end of the refresh interval.
